headline: How Investors Are Reacting To BXP (BXP) Securing Starr as Anchor Tenant at 343 Madison
summary: BXP recently secured a 20-year, roughly 275,000-square-foot lease with global investment and insurance firm Starr at its under-construction 343 Madison Avenue tower in Midtown Manhattan, giving Starr about 30% of the planned 46-story building for its future New York headquarters. This long-term anchor lease at a yet-to-be-completed, amenity-rich project underscores sustained tenant interest in high-quality Manhattan offices despite broader sector uncertainty. We’ll now explore how locking in...
